extendedInfo.description: !!! REQUIRES ROOT ! USE AT YOUR OWN RISK !!!FOR BUG AND ERROR REPORTS, PLEASE GO TO SETTINGS->ADVANCED AND CLICK ON SEND REPORT. ADD A SHORT DESCRIPTION, E.G., WHAT YOU TRIED TO DO, WHAT YOU EXPECTED TO HAPPEN AND WHAT HAPPENED AND SEND THE REPORT. YOU CAN ALSO FILE BUG/ERROR REPORTS, FEATURE REQUESTS ETC. VIA E-MAIL OR USING THE BUGTRACKER ( http://cygery.com/mantisbt/set_project.php?project_id=4 ). IRC: #repetitouch on freenode.net (developer nick: cygery).READ THE EULA ( http://cygery.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/en-eula-repetitouch-free.txt ) BEFORE INSTALLING AND USING THIS APPREPLAYING TOUCH AND/OR OTHER EVENTS CAN CAUSE UNWANTED EFFECTS WHICH MAY CAUSE ERRORS OR DAMAGE. ALWAYS MONITOR THE DEVICE WHEN REPLAYING AND ENSURE NO SUCH UNWANTED EFFECTS OCCUR! YOU CAN PRESS THE POWER BUTTON TO STOP REPLAY!Make sure that RepetiTouch was granted root privileges before reporting an error (in logcat check that there are no "couldn't get root" messages)!RepetiTouch for Androidâ¢ - Record touch events and replay them!RepetiTouch enables easy recording and replaying of touch events. Simply record and replay your touchscreen input!Just click the record button and start recording - the panel will stay on top almost all the time! When you're done, you can replay your touch events as easily. To access the menu, click on the star.But beware, replaying touch events can fail or cause unwanted effects for many reasons, e.g., if replay is started at a different device state than during the record or if during replay a popup is shown or something else is different than during record. Thus, always monitor your device during replay! Replay automatically stops if you're touching the screen, pressing the power button or on a phone call. Also, you can simply close RepetiTouch by long clicking on the blue star.If replaying does not work, go to Settings->Advanced and try to change the "Override Multitouch Type" setting to "Legacy Mode". Please note that you have to wait at least three seconds after your last action before hitting stop in "Legacy Mode". Else, the record will be broken.Thread on xda: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2270795This is the free, limited version:- no multitouch recording- recording time limited to 60 seconds- no loop replay mode- saving record only to a single default file in app directory- panel not movable/flippable- ...The pro version is available here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cygery.repetitouch.proPermissions:ACCESS_SUPERUSER: Needed to record&replay the touch events.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW: Needed to display the panel.READ_PHONE_STATE: Needed to stop replay on a phone call.INTERNET: Needed to load ads.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: Needed to load ads.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Needed to save a report before sending it.Android is a trademark of Google Inc.Tags: RepetiTouch, touchscreen, touch, record, replay, input, event, android record touch events

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This is a great app for me as a gamer. But is has no loop in this free version.. i wish the pro version is available world wide. I cant download it because of location restriction..
reviews.author: Young Sunday Domingo

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Good app but not having loop in free version is a pretty lame way of forcing people to pay for the pro version. Though I need loop and am willing to pay for it, but where the hell is the pro version? Ah, you don\'t have it ready yet... Then why not include the only function that people would use your app for (Loop mode) in the free version meanwhile?

reviews.title: Can\'t get passed terms screen
reviews.comment: The terms screen loads on my galaxy tab, but it won\'t let me \"Accept\" OR \"Deny\" them!  The app therefore never starts!
reviews.author: Cameron Bell

reviews.title: Great App!!
reviews.comment: App is great and simple to use. Adding the below features would be make it perfect.     1. Increased recording time (60 seconds is not enough)  2. Ability to name and save multiple recordings 3. Ability to speed up playback. (2x 3x)   4. Schedule playback (every 1 minute)  Keep up the great work. Looking forward to updates!!

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on Note *UPDATE* Now it does!
reviews.comment: I have a quincyatt device with Cyanogenmod installed. It just freezes up my phone. Works well on my friend\'s phone however so I know there\'s something up with mine in particular. *UPDATE* I emailed him and he was very polite! Quickly helped me get it up and running. Excellent app from an excellent dev! I highly recommend going Pro. Worth every penny and is much better!
